Review Text: We had a blue cheese burger and a cheese burger. Cancun fries and truffle fries. It’s a bit pricey for the quality. Fries were great and great portion, however the the beef is way to oily and greasy. I would not recommend their burgers

Review Title: Nive burgers but a bit expensive.
Review Text: We ordered the big burger and a bacon burger and the cheese burger. It was really good but the prices were a bit high. I wish to try the smash burger next time may be.

Enjoyed and evening meal at this restaurant...very nice with quick and prompt service, thank you.

We will certainly visit again.
Very tasty. Beef paddy is very good quality. The different burgers ordered were all good as well as the fries. Reasonable value for the money

Review Title: Burgers phong cách, hương vị và chất lượng đúng "Mỹ"
Review Text: 1 quán burgers đúng chuẩn vị mỹ, kiểu mỹ. mình được biết các đầu bếp tại đây được học và chỉ dạy trực tiếp từ Anh chủ người Mỹ sống tại Chicago. đáng để ghé ăn và quay trở lại nhiều lần, vì nó quá tuyệt vời.

Review Title: A nice restaurant next to Ben Thanh market
Review Text:
A great spot to rest and have a dinner after shopping at the Ben Thanh market.
a nice rooftop with street view.
We enjoyed our time here.
THIS place is the best burger place in town so far. if youre looking for an authentic burger place. THIS IS IT!!!

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 3
Dịch vụ: 2
Đồ ăn: 3
Review Text: We came one evening for the special deals but in fact the prices were so good on the menu that we ended up ordering what ever we fancied from the menu. Although I had come to try the beef burgers I was tempted by the Cajun chicken burger instead as I love spicy Cajun flavours and one friend had the regular chicken burger and fries. Our other friend had a cheese burger with coleslaw and French fries. The service honestly wasn't very good throughout. I arrived first so I ordered a drink. When it arrived the waitress put it the furthest point away on the table , well out of arm's reach, although she could easily have walked to where I was sitting at the table. However, I soon forgot about that as it was minor. However, later I asked if it was possible to have the coleslaw without the ginger if I ordered coleslaw. She pleasantly said she would check with the chef. 20 minutes later I asked her if she had had a chance to speak to the chef and she said that yes it was possible to prepare a coleslaw without the ginger and that she had forgotten to come back and tell me. When our food arrived, one of my friend's French fries had been forgotten, even though our order had been previously read back to us. They finally arrived a lot later, as the waitress asked the chef to cook them after we had received our burgers. She also tried to clear them away 10 minutes later when there were still half left in the container. We had to assume that she couldn't see that they weren't finished from the angle she was standing at. I ordered a second drink that didn't arrive either. After about 15 minutes I asked about the drink and the waitress said she hadn't realised that I had asked for another one when I put in the request earlier.  Apart from these hiccoughs the staff were friendly and appeared to be willing to help. I also appreciated the flexibility about making a coleslaw according to a customer's request. My friend said her regular burger was fine, as were her fries and our other friend also said her fries were good. However her beefburger was very rare, though in fairness she hadn't thought to ask for it to be medium-well done. As she was pressed for time she decided not to ask for it to be cooked a bit longer but she took it away as a take away to eat later at home. I must admit that I was disappointed with my Cajun burger. It tasted like a regular breaded chicken burger with hardly any spices at all. Salt and pepper helped to give it more flavour and there were some delicious sauces on the table which I added to it  which did help matters. I make a lot of Cajun chicken, as well as eat it in restaurants a lot, so I guess I was expecting the chicken underneath the breadcrumbs to have been marinaded and flavored with Cajun spices, or mixed in with the breadcrumbs at the very least. I think I would definitely like to go again but I would try a beefburger rather than a chicken burger, especially as there were so many tempting toppings on the menu. Friends who are fans of Soul Burger have persuaded me to give it another try but to try completely different burgers. Finally, the coleslaw too was bland and rather disappointing - the grated cabbage was virtually dry, no dressing and hardly discernable mayonnaise. So, next time I think ditch the coleslaw, order French fries and try one of the beef burgers with some delicious sounding toppings.

First of all I walked here so I did not have to worry about parking or a motorbike but in Vietnam you can always find parking for your motorbike let me just say. I came on Wednesday night for the cheeseburger special for 99,000 it is a good hamburger quality meat good cheese and a nice bun. A little on the smaller side for hamburger standards but I enjoyed everything. A 4 star restaurant friendly staff and great music and happy hour beers for 30,000 tiger draft.

Arrogant, scum, racist owner who yells at his customers, calling them "white boys" and telling them that they are lucky to be in VN. One shocked customer chose to leave the premises while I was there.
This "restaurant" does not offer parking, so they relegate that task to some local thugs.
While I was there, I had to go down 3 times to stop them from mishandling my property. One of them managed to steal my keys and kept them  hostage for 20 minutes. Only After 25 minutes of searching and threatening with police did they give it back.
If you want to lose your keys, your bike or your mind, or are up for a fight, do go to Soul Burger, they are sure to show you a bad time and ruin your day.
The 3 waitresses that worked there were kind and professional, and just as apalled as we were to their manager wrong doings.
Diese Restaurant ist super, man hat einen tollen Ausblick auf den Ben than Market und das Essen schmeckt super. Die Bedienung ist super nett und aufmerksam, die Preise sind Top.

I ordered the cheese burger. It was the worst burger I have had in a long time. Completely bland and I think when I ordered 'well done' they thought I meat the buns. To top it off the service was incredibly slow inspite of having a kitchen full of staff and barely any customers.  I reckon the reviews here must be rigged.

Review Title: Tất cả mọi thứ về những điều tốt đẹp ở đây là tuyệt vời!
Review Text: Bánh burger hoàn hảo đối với tôi có thịt ngon, thịt xông khói giòn, cheddar dày và quan trọng nhất là một chiếc bánh không tan rã khi bạn ăn bánh burger. Nơi này có bánh mì kẹp thịt burger tuyệt vời và tất cả các bên trên. Đi kèm với khoai tây chiên là phong cách làm tại nhà và thực sự tốt. Ngoài ra, burger thịt lợn kéo là tuyệt vời như ngô trên lõi ngô với parmesan có hương vị tuyệt vời. Thực phẩm tuyệt vời và rất khuyến khích!

Review Title: Burger haven amongst the bustling night markets
Review Text: Great hidden gem featuring western style burgers and quality bar appetizers, right next to one of the biggest markets overlooking street vendors. Chill late night atmosphere and very friendly staff. Delicious!

Burgers and fries were very tasty. Definitely geared towards tourists. A little pricier than other restaurants in area but we thought it was worth it. For reference, it ended up costing $25 USD total for 2 regular burgers, 2 beers and 2 bottles of water.

Great little venue with inside seating and a small terrace outside overlooking the market street. 

The burgers range from 150k to 300k including chips or salad, and drinks are around 50k for drinks.  No service fees or tax.

If you want a break from the normal Vietnamese food, try it out

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 3
Dịch vụ: 4
Đồ ăn: 5
Review Title: Best burger in town, from far
Review Text:
I don't really understand how there can be arguments about the best burger in Saigon after you tried Soul Burger. The only thing I would hear is that they are too "sophisticated" for someone who is simply looking for a cheese burger, but if you are into "gourmet burgers" and original stuff, don't hesitate. 
Onion rings rocks, and are just HUGE. 
Burgers of the month are always awesome too, staff is cool, service is decent and beer is ice cold. Congrats !

Review Title: Amazing burger and great beer selection
Review Text: I’ve been hearing good thing about burger place in HCMC and chose this place to try it out. It is easy access from the market and walking distance in district ones

We were there at the best time! It was Gabe’s, the owners Birthday! Regardless, the food was the best and burgers unbeatable. Lots of choices. A little difficult to find but well wort it. Owner is very hospitable. Enjoy a GREAT burger.

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 5
Dịch vụ: 5
Đồ ăn: 5
Review Text: We ate here three years ago longing for a western style burger after three months in Asia. Found this gem near our hotel directly across from the Ben Thanh market. The burgers are simply the best I have had anywhere. Would go there again for sure during our next HCMC visit. The truffle fries are also great. Tasty burgers cooked to perfection. The service can be a little slow but this is not a fast food restaurant.

Review Title: Bánh mì kẹp thịt tuyệt vời
Review Text: Vâng. Chắc chắn là một nơi tuyệt vời để có bánh mì kẹp thịt nấu chín. Âm nhạc là như mong đợi và các nhân viên được đào tạo tốt và hữu ích.

The burgers are awesome, the pattys was juicy and the bread was perfect. French fries were fried perfectly, the garlic dip was wonderful and so were the drinks.

Finding this place can be difficult as you have to walk into a small corridor and up a floor.

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 3
Dịch vụ: 4
Đồ ăn: 5
Review Title: ボリュームがありおいしいハンバーガー
Review Text:
ベンタイン市場の近くにあり、入り口は分かりにくかったです。細い廊下を奥まで進み、階段を上ると店内です。
ベトナムの物価から考えても金額はそこそこ高いと思いますが、ボリューミーで味もしっかりとしているハンバーガーをここでは味わう事ができます。肉の焼き加減も自分でチョイスできます。この時はミディアムでいただきました。

I ate Blues brothers burger, meat was excellent but the burger is little bit difficult to eat beacuse there is no stick in the middle and the meat is crumbling. The onion rings were not so good, they were too oily to actually taste onion. Still, worth the money
The place is not big but comfortable and tidy. You can watch how your burger is being made. The music is really soulful, was almost dancing while waiting for food.
